title: Mixed Reality-Based Social Studies Virtual Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary social studies content and pedagogical methods, mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to develop creative lesson design competencies using mixed reality (MR) technology through field-immersive educational simulations.

learning_goals: Design three or more situational learning scenarios utilizing Mixed Reality (MR) technology
Operate MR learning modules in a mobile device-based microlearning environment
Propose a class model that achieves at least 85% learner engagement through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
